features: 【APTX HD Codec & QCC3046 Chip】Advanced audio codec APTX HD and the latest Bluetooth 5.2 technology combine with a powerful 10mm driver and high-end chipset QCC3046 to deliver rich, immersive sound while offering the convenience of wireless streaming. These headphones support A2DP, AVRCP, HSP, and HFP profiles, ensuring compatibility with most smartphones.

【Sweat Resistant for Active Lifestyles】These running headphones are designed to keep up with your active lifestyle, with an IPX5 rating that makes them sweat-resistant. An ergonomic design ensures comfortable wear during runs, jogs, cycling, driving, camping, hiking, gym exercises, and more.

【Long-Lasting Usage & Magnetic Design】With up to 12 hours of usage time and just 1.5 hours of charging time, you can stay connected and entertained all day. The built-in magnetic design allows you to attach the earphones together for easy storage when not in use.

【Customizable Comfort with Built-in Mics】These headphones feature an in-line mic and volume control buttons for easy answering of calls or music control. They come with 4 pairs of earbuds in different sizes and 2 additional sizes of ear fins for a secure fit. The silicone materials and ergonomically designed ear hooks ensure comfort even for all-day wear.
【Worry-Free Service】If you encounter any issues, our friendly customer service team is always here to help. Contact us for hassle-free support.
description: Product Description Sports · Music · Fun Superior Sound Adopt Qualcomm QCC3046 chipset with Bluetooth 5.2 to ensure a fast and stable connection at low consumption. The aptX-HD codec and 10mm big driver deliver enhanced melody with impressive bass and mellow mids to perfect your listening experience in the gym, on the street, or in the subway. Sport Earphones IPX5-rated sweatproof protection prevents your earphones from sweat, light rain, and accidental splash damage. Together with the ergonomic and lightweight design that fits your ear canals seamlessly, the in ear earphones can be your ideal partner while jogging, running, hiking, etc. For Active Lifestyle From Q30 to Q30+, and the Q30 HD+, SoundPEATS keeps continuing the classic. The "wired" Bluetooth headphones get you out of the 3.5mm jack and tangled cable and provide you with wireless enjoyment. The snug fit and the immersive sound with deep bass make the earphones perfect for your daily routines, commute, workout, study, calls, etc. It's comfortable to wear, easy to find and carry, and friendly to operate. Long Lasting Up to 12 hours of listening time per charge and only 1-2 hours of charging time to get refilled. The sport headphones are an ideal companion for your daily and weekly workouts. Easy Operation In-line button control with a built-in microphone allows you to control the music and hands-free phone calls without bothering to take out the phone from your pocket. Magnetic Design The built-in magnets in each earpiece attach two earbuds tightly like a necklace around your neck for tangle-free wearing and convenient storage when not in use. Snug Fit Different sizes of ear tips are provided for your easy and secure fit without discomfort during sports. The right size brings satisfying noise reduction performance as well.
